alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 1:58PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila and Coconino Counties near Kohls Ranch through 230 PM MST... At 157 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hunter Creek, or 11 miles west of Forest Lakes, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, up to nickel size hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Christopher Creek, Tonto Village, Kohls Ranch, Hunter Creek, Mead Ranch, Forest Road 169 Campground, Bear Flat, Upper Tonto Creek Campground, Spillway Campground, Ponderosa Campground, Sharp Creek Campground, Forest Road 195 Campground, Mogollon Campground, Forest Road 9350 Campground, Rim Campground, Promontory Pit Road Campground, Christopher Creek Campground, Woods Canyon Lake Campground and Crook Campground. This includes State Route 260 between mile markers 264 and 281. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County
